prompts: Create a butterfly Pokemon that has bright blue wings and a cheerful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon with elegant wings and the ability to blend into floral environments.
Design a whimsical bug-type Pokemon with striking patterns and a playful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands, showcasing a beautiful blue color scheme.
Show me a tiny Pokemon with delicate features and the power to create gentle breezes.
Make a serene flying-type Pokemon that symbolizes peace and harmony in nature.
